name: directus-db-utils
description: A helper to create backups and export schemes for directus

scripts.scheme: npm run createSchemeFolder && sudo $npm_package_config_configuredDirectus schema snapshot $npm_package_config_pathToSchemes/"$(date "+%F")"-"$(date "+%s")"-scheme.yaml && npm run scheme-help
scripts.scheme-export-yaml: sudo $npm_package_config_configuredDirectus schema snapshot --yes ./scheme.yaml && echo 'Scheme exported to ./scheme.yaml'
scripts.scheme-export-json: sudo $npm_package_config_configuredDirectus schema snapshot --yes --format json ./scheme.json && echo 'Scheme exported to ./scheme.json'
scripts.schema-apply:latest: npm run pre:schema-apply:latest && sudo $npm_package_config_configuredDirectus schema apply ./schemes/$(cat ./schemes/latest.txt)
scripts.backup: npm run createBackupFolder && sudo cp $npm_package_config_pathToDbFile $npm_package_config_pathToBackups/"$(date "+%F")"-"$(date "+%s")"-backup.db && npm run backup-help

author: Nils Baumgartner
